fixed_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to 1 foe equal to 106.2/111.5/116.8% of Attack. 59.0/62.0/64.9% chance to inflict Burn for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Agi

innate_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to all foes equal to 53.1/55.8/58.4% of Attack. 29.5/31.0/32.4% chance to inflict Burn for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Maragi

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 2.9%. When attacking a Burning foe, increase Attack by 25%.
passive_skill.name: Kindling Whip

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 2.9%. When attacking a Burning foe, increase Attack by 28%.
passive_skill.name: Kindling Whip I

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to 1 foe equal to 360.0%/385.2%/410.4% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
